key.name: window-size-percent
key.description: When a window is unmaximized, it will be shrunk to this percentage of the work area if it is larger. Smaller windows keep their original size.

key.name: min-open-size-percent
key.summary: Minimum open size for maximizable windows (0 = disabled)
key.description: New windows that have a maximize button and open smaller than this percentage will be enlarged and centered automatically.

key.name: original-layout-cache
key.description: Stored automatically when the extension enables. Used to restore the user's button-layout on disable, even after a crash.
